pullRequest.title: Fix AT TIME ZONE for TIMESTAMP
pullRequest.bodyText: It was producing a timestamp(3) with time zone instead of preserving the precision of the provided timestamp

nodes.bodyText: p is not a variable here

commit.message:
Fix AT TIME ZONE for TIMESTAMP

AT TIME ZONE converted timestamps to timestamp(3) with time zone. With this
change, the precision is preserved.

afterCommit.message:
Fix AT TIME ZONE for TIMESTAMP

AT TIME ZONE converted timestamps to timestamp(3) with time zone. With this
change, the precision is preserved.
